translation.en: The very best folktales are the ones that are both highly adaptable,
translation.ja: 最高と言われる民話は順応性がとても高く―

translation.en: but also ones that really speak to kind of fundamental truths,
translation.ja: 基本的な真実をきちんと語ってる

translation.en: fundamental concerns, that are going to be relevant to all humans everywhere and at every time.
translation.ja: どの時代でも場所でも人間に関係ある普遍的な事だ

translation.en: I learned that don't talk to strangers,
translation.ja: 知らない人と話さない

translation.en: and always listen to your parents or the family you know.
translation.ja: いつも両親や家族の言うことを聞く

translation.en: If I saw the wolf, I would just keep walking, not talk to him,
translation.ja: オオカミを見たら話さず

translation.en: go to grandmother's house,
translation.ja: 祖母の家に行く

translation.en: and just eat, no stopping.
translation.ja: そして食べ続ける

translation.en: You don't always have to
translation.ja: いつもきれいな服を

translation.en: wear something pretty
translation.ja: 着なくていい

translation.en: or look pretty to be pretty from the inside.
translation.ja: 外面だけでなく内側からきれいにする

translation.en: If the person liked you,
translation.ja: あなたを好きな人 あなたを好きな人ゾーイ　米国

translation.en: or they wanted to be your friend, they will like you for who you are.
translation.ja: ゾーイ　米国友達になりたい人は素のあなたが好き 友達になりたい人は素のあなたが好き

translation.en: [in Spanish] If we believe and trust ourselves,
translation.ja: 〈自分を信じれば〉

translation.en: we can move forward, no matter what.
translation.ja: 〈何があっても前進できる〉

translation.en: [Negga in English] And they lived peacefully and prosperous.
translation.ja: 平和に豊かに暮らしました

translation.en: Or happily and contentedly until the end of their days.
translation.ja: 幸せに満足して一生を終えました

translation.en: Or in happiness and luxury to this very day.
translation.ja: 幸福で贅沢に今も暮らしてる

translation.en: Or happily ever after.
translation.ja: めでたしめでたし

translation.en: Or snip, snap, snout, and then the story was out.
translation.ja: チョキ パチン おしまい
